title: Secrets | Episode 1
description:
In the series premiere, Clementine, a strong-willed, stand-offish blind teen sets out to make her first day of her senior year in a new school as normal as possible but the voice in her head is making that near impossible. Elsewhere on a different timeline, two suspicious agents are on the hunt for “Client Four” who has just escaped the mysterious Institute they work for. 
~~
From QCODE, makers of fantastic audio fiction. Visit QCODEMedia.com to learn more. And, check out some of our other shows including: The Left Right Game with Tessa Thompson, Borrasca with Cole Sprouse, Blackout with Rami Malek, Soft Voice with Naomi Scott. 

Follow us:
On Instagram @QCODEMedia 
On Twitter @QCODEMedia
